name: PENNSYLVANIA POWER COMPANY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Power Co. v. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA POWER COMPANY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
CAPPY, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alan L. Reed, Morgan, Lewis & Bockius, Marc J. Sonnenfeld, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David M. Barasch, Consumer Advocate, Scott Rubin, Asst. Consumer Advocate, Office of Atty. Gen., Kevin J. Moody, Asst. Counsel, Pennsylvania Public Utility Com’n, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
587 A.2d 312
PENNSYLVANIA POWER COMPANY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 21, 1991.
Alan L. Reed, Morgan, Lewis & Bockius, Marc J. Sonnenfeld, Philadelphia, for appellant.
David M. Barasch, Consumer Advocate, Scott Rubin, Asst. Consumer Advocate, Office of Atty. Gen., Kevin J. Moody, Asst. Counsel, Pennsylvania Public Utility Com’n, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
